title: The Crockin' Girls Slow Cookin' Companion: Yummy Recipes from Family, Friends, and Our Crockin' Community
description: The highly anticipated slow cooking cookbook from the Crockin' Girls! 376 page hardcover cookbook featuring 165 recipes and beautiful color photography with each recipe. Categories include main dishes, breakfast, appetizers, soups and stews, and desserts.
author: Nicole; Marwitz Sparks
